entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
